bettergrass.title: BetterGrassify 设置
bettergrass.betterGrassMode.desc:
§4关 §r- 原版默认
§3流畅 §r- 方块的顶部纹理将应用于其所有侧面（较慢）
§d高品质 §r- 方块的顶部纹理将动态应用于它的所需侧面（最慢）
bettergrass.resourcePackCompatibilityMod: Fix issues with various resource-packs like Alacrity.
bettergrass.snowy.desc: 连接被雪覆盖的草方块
bettergrass.moreBlocks.desc: 应该在斜坡上像草地一样连接的方块
bettergrass.betterSnowMode.desc:
§4Off §r- No snow layer will be generated.
§3OptiFine-like §r- Shows a snow layer beneath specific blocks that have at-least one snow layer or snow block near them.
§dLambdaBetterGrass-like §r- Shows a snow layer beneath specific blocks that have at-least "two" snow layers or snow blocks near them.
bettergrass.noyacl.warn:
§cBetterGrassify is unable to display a configuration screen because YetAnotherConfigLib mod is not installed. Please use the configuration file instead. Sorry for the inconvenience!§r

但如果您使用的是Sodium，则可以在"视频设置"中更改大多数设置
